name: Labyrinth of Fright
description:
A maze-trivia game that tests your knowledge of horror movies, as well as being able to get through a maze of terror in order to help you escape with your life!!

Use your knowledge of horror films in order to pick the right paths within the time provided and escape the maze!

https://mywebspace.quinnipiac.edu/mesmith10/211/Project1_Final/
